Package maths

Class Matrix

  • java.lang.Object
    • maths.Matrix
  • public class Matrix
extends Object
    A class to use matrices. It allows basic calculations between matrices such as addition, subtraction and multiplication.
    Version:
    3 nov. 2021
    Author:
    Alexis BONAL alexis.bonal.etu@univ-lille.fr

    • Field Detail

      • content

        protected double[][] content
        The content of the matrix. In order to be able to have the majority of numbers, it is an array of double.

              int nbCol)

        nbCol - The number of columns.
